ing: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1/2 teaspoon curry powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Eat with crackers. Friends will think you are good at exotic cooking with this mix of curry powder."
ins: Combine artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, sour cream, eggs, curry powder, salt, and black pepper in a bowl until well mixed.
